alfredsnippet.snippet:
"We have no reason to doubt that the magnetic activity of the Sun is in conformity with the equations of Newton and Maxwell. On the other hand, there are many aspects of the activity that we do not understand, e.g., the fibril state of the photospheric magnetic fields and their subsurface origin on both small and large scales."

- E. N. Parker, Reflections On Macrophysics And The Sun, Solar Physics 176: 219-247, 1197
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Sun's Magnetic Activity
